name: Abstrum (Alpha)
description:
Abstrum Is an tower defense game where you need to protect an wall from enemy cubes.

the game is in very early stages, having only a single stage, and using placeholder graphics, i plan to change that soon.

Features:

    1.  Different Towers, Cash, Turret, Mine, Double, Explosive, Dual, Frost, Fire,Spike    Factory, And Anti-Air

    2. 13 Enemies, Weak, Medium, Strong, Super Strong, Fast, Summon, Giant, Flying Versions Of Weak, Medium, Strong, And Super Strong, Explosive And Shield

    3. Endless Mode:Endless Randomized Waves, Play As Much As You Want!

    4. Support Items, Place Down Spikes, Throw Bombs, And Call Cash Boosts!

    5.Sandbox Mode: Infinite Cash And Lives, And The Ability To Summon Enemies, Do Whatever You Want!
